title: The Case Day
description:
Stop what you are doing and go listen to The Case... TheCasePodcast.com Blind Mike is in studio on The Case Day with Kirk and Steve. Kirk's life is forever changed after receiving a late night butt dial from his producer on Saturday. The MLB is boycotting Georgia over an election reform bill. Team Minihane is making its return to The Dozens Trivia on Tuesday night. Stay tuned this week as Kirk makes his rounds on the other Barstool shows promoting The Case.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
